__e: And when it had to do with Scottie, you gave me a big speech about trust, about how I had to trust you had rational reasons for what you were doing.
If you wish to lecture me again on drunken disillusionment...
You going to lecture me about sleeping with people you work with?
We don't want our collective asses chewed out again.
Look, whatever. Last one to preach.
You have a sermon to give in a few hours.
